channel.title: Client Error
channel.description: Whenever I click the stats tab on my client it freezes and I get this error: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.method105(client.java:10013) at client.method105(client.java:9837) at client.method36(client.java:2221) at client.method102(client.java:9309) at client.method9(client.java:10475) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:137) at client.run(client.java:5385) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] I'm not sure what the problem is... :/

item.dc:creator: @Piled_by_Noobs Piled by Noobs

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

It’s because something in thread 5 is substring(x) where x is longer than the amount of digits that currently exist. I would have to see the source code if I was to help any further.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Piled_by_Noobs Piled by Noobs
item.description:
@Piled_by_Noobs wrote:

Whenever I click the stats tab on my client it freezes and I get this error:

Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.method105(client.java:10013) at client.method105(client.java:9837) at client.method36(client.java:2221) at client.method102(client.java:9309) at client.method9(client.java:10475) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:137) at client.run(client.java:5385) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
I’m not sure what the problem is…

Read full topic
